snippet.title: Emberbane - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Emberbane is an action platformer inspired by Avatar: The Last Airbender. Master the four elements and take your revenge against the Malevolent Gods.
Wishlist us on Steam: https://bit.ly/3zgXGMV
 
Follow our Kickstarter Campaign here: https://bit.ly/3cfNvz3

Follow our Instagram here: https://bit.ly/3AYnpuN

Follow our Twitter here: https://bit.ly/3O9VBqk
